column5: Im thinking of heading up to simcoe sometime this week and renting a hut from one of the local operators. Can anyone recomend one to me??? Thanks for the help.
What species are you wanting to target?

Assuming you're targeting perch / pike, I would recommend either Dave's Fish Huts or IceFishingOutfitters out of Virginia Beach, Lake Simcoe. I've fished a fair amount at each and they're both equally as good, I can't recommend one over the other I like them both. pm me if you're interested in more details about them, and good luck!
